The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/home/dexp/Music/coffee-shop-api/serverl.serviceRawFile:
# "org" ensures this Service is used with the correct Serverless Framework Access Key.
org: lionking
# "app" enables Serverless Framework Dashboard features and sharing them with other Services.
app: coffee-shop-api
service: coffee-shop-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: ${opt:region, 'us-east-1'}
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
  environment:
    COFFEE_TABLE: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-coffees
    STAGE: ${self:provider.stage}
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:Query
            - dynamodb:Scan
            - dynamodb:GetItem
            - dynamodb:PutItem
            - dynamodb:UpdateItem
            - dynamodb:DeleteItem
          Resource: !GetAtt CoffeeTable.Arn

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

functions:
  createCoffee:
    handler: src/handlers/createCoffee.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: coffees
          method: post
          cors: true

  getCoffees:
    handler: src/handlers/getCoffees.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: coffees
          method: get
          cors: true

  getCoffee:
    handler: src/handlers/getCoffee.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: coffees/{id}
          method: get
          cors: true

  updateCoffee:
    handler: src/handlers/updateCoffee.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: coffees/{id}
          method: put
          cors: true

  deleteCoffee:
    handler: src/handlers/deleteCoffee.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: coffees/{id}
          method: delete
          cors: true

resources:
  Resources:
    CoffeeTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.COFFEE_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: id
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        Tags:
          - Key: Environment
            Value: ${self:provider.stage}
          - Key: Service
            Value: ${self:service}

custom:
  serverless-offline:
    httpPort: 3000

build:
  esbuild:
    bundle: true
    minify: true
    sourcemap: false
    external:
      - 'aws-sdk'
      - 'uuid'
